Title: Requires reporting to the federal bureau of investigation's national use-of-force data collection program
Summary: Requires the chief of every police department, each county sheriff, and the superintendent of state police to report to the federal bureau of investigation's national use-of-force data collection program.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to requiring reporting to the federal bureau of investigation's national use-of-force data collection program
